name: Master Peace, the True Dracoslaying King
effectText: To Tribute Summon this card face-up, you can Tribute Continuous Spells/Traps you control, as well as monsters. Unaffected by the effects of cards with the same card type (Monster, Spell, and/or Trap) as the original card type of the cards Tributed for its Tribute Summon. Once per turn, if you control this Tribute Summoned monster (Quick Effect): You can banish 1 Continuous Spell/Trap from your GY, then target 1 other card on the field; destroy it.
